title: Rioter Game Request
body:
I finally have all the champs (got Gragas yesterday) and was wondering if I could get a game with some rioters. I know it's not as huge of a milestone as the usual 1000th win people request a game for, but it did take over 2 years of playing quite a bit.  

Thanks :D

replies.body:
That's a milestone imo!

I would love to play a game with you :D (regardless of said milestone). Feel free to add me in game!

Is there any specific time you're available? :)
Not particularly, just whenever you find the time.
Sounds Great! Thank you so much! :D
I will try not to feed, captain. o7
We have a Final Fantasy loving Rioter in the house
if i had known that i would have asked for a game ages ago lol...
Game was great! Ended up winning and everyone was super nice. :D
Jungle {{champion:12}} is too op clearly. It was a fun game!

WAIT WHAT!!!!! 
IVE REACHED 1000 WINS AND HAVE LIKE 5 CHAMPS TO GO NOT INCLUDING ALL THE SKIN SETS I HAVE WHERES MY GAME RIOT
Not when you are so rude about it
lol i wasnt being rude but seeing as u cant convey emotions through typed messages i can see how that is missunderstood

> lol i wasnt being rude but seeing as u cant convey emotions through typed messages i can see how that is missunderstood

I've got my eye on you {{item:2050}}
Holy crap. Not a Rioter, but grats. That's fuckin' impressive.
